alert.note: Alert for Laurens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laurens County through 415 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Dexter, or 13 miles southwest of Dublin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, East Dublin, Dexter, Cadwell, Rentz and Harlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central Georgia.
